itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with comedian Josh Wolf as we discuss taking a ferret into Trader Joes, why Kevin Costner always wants his penis in a movie, what age you should stop showering with your parents, and drunk late night purchases on Ebay. Hilarious show.
